channel.title: Client freezes
channel.description:
Okay i am using the source aggroth v4, both source and client.
2 solutions, first soultion when im using the client without it being jared then it works completely fine when i teleport around the server. second problem is that once its jared its freezes when i teleport to places?
I am new to coding never mind editing the client, but i have done some research and i could believe its to do with the cache? but how do i get another one? does it need to be aggroths or any client?
any help is appreciated, skype name is jason.b451 if you would like to contact. Thank you!

item.title: Client freezes

item.description:
@poison_blood wrote:

Okay i am using the source aggroth v4, both source and client.

2 solutions, first soultion when im using the client without it being jared then it works completely fine when i teleport around the server.
second problem is that once its jared its freezes when i teleport to places?
